name: open-lyrics
title: Open Lyrics
description: Real time lyric syncing and search with LRCLIB.

commands.name: identify
commands.title: Identify Song
commands.subtitle: Get lyrics for currently playing song
commands.description: Detects currently playing song on Spotify or Apple Music and displays lyrics.

commands.name: search
commands.title: Search Lyrics

" && exit 1
